# UIPrintInteractionController.CompletionHandler

**Type Alias**

A completion handler for responding to the completion of a print job or for handling printing errors.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias CompletionHandler = (UIPrintInteractionController, Bool, (any Error)?) -> Void
```

## Discussion

You implement this block as the final argument of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPrintInteractionController/present(animated:completionHandler:)], [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPrintInteractionController/present(from:animated:completionHandler:)], or [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPrintInteractionController/present(from:in:animated:completionHandler:)]. When a print job concludes, you can reset any state set up for printing and do related housekeeping tasks. If the print job encountered an error, it is likely to be a programming error, so you might want to log the error for debugging purposes.



## Printing directly to a printer

- **print(to:completionHandler:)**: Prints directly to the specified printer.

items.description: Prints directly to the specified printer.
items.name: print(to:completionHandler:)
